casebody.data:
Abrons Family Practice & Urgent Care, PA, et al.
v.
NC Department of Health & Human Services, et al. 427A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 31, 2017. Mr. Camden R. Webb, Ms. Elizabeth Connolly Stone, Attorneys at Law, Raleigh, For Abrons Family Practice And Urgent Care, PA, et al. Mr. Amar Majmundar, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ms. Olga Vysotskaya de Brito, Assistant Attorney General, For North Carolina Department of Health and Human Services. Ms. Jennifer K. Van Zant, Greensboro, Mr. Charles F. Marshall, III, Mr. Bryan Starrett, Greensboro, Mr. Bryant C. Boren, Jr., Mr. Ryan L. Bangert, Mr. Van H. Beckwith, Attorney at Law, For Computer Sciences Corporation. Mr. Mark S. Thomas, Attorney at Law, Raleigh.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of January 2017 by Bryant C. Boren for Admission Pro Hac Vice:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 31st of January 2017."
